title: EU accuses Russia of 'derailing real progress toward peace' with 'unfounded claims'

No evidence found of alleged Ukrainian drone attack on Putin's residence
subhead: Despite accusations leveled by Russia, no strike has been documented around the presidential estate, located 400 kilometers northwest of Moscow. Kyiv, which condemned the claim as a 'lie,' sees in it a pretext for the Kremlin to intensify its strikes and toughen its stance in US-led peace negotiations.

title: Taiwan says Chinese ships 'withdrawing' after drills
subhead: China launched missiles and deployed fighter jets, navy ships and coastguard vessels around Taiwan on Monday and Tuesday in live-fire drills aimed at simulating a blockade of the self-ruled island. China said Wednesday it had 'successfully completed' the drills.

title: Brigitte Bardot's funeral: Far-right leader Le Pen will attend, Macron will not
subhead: The film star's animal foundation said her funeral in a church in her southern hometown of Saint-Tropez on January 7 would be followed by a private burial, but has not said where.

title: Online gambling companies zero in on France's disadvantaged neighborhoods
subhead: Exposed to a flood of advertising, young men from urban areas have increasingly turned to online sports betting. This trend leads to addictive behaviors, now deemed 'a public health issue.'

Fine champagnes at affordable prices: Le Monde's selection of the best bubbles for the holiday season
subhead: Rémi Barroux, Stéphane Davet, Laure Gasparotto and Sébastien Jenvrin tasted 181 non-vintage champagnes, known as 'brut sans année,' each priced at no more than €50. They selected 81, from both major champagne houses and independent winemakers.

title: How dining etiquette reveals social divides among young people
subhead: Choosing a natural wine, slicing comté cheese the 'right' way, opening an oyster: For young people lacking the right social codes, embarrassment at the table is often inevitable.

title: Israel: The MAGA world's new obsession
subhead: As Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is expected to meet with US President Donald Trump in Miami on Monday, December 29, Israel has become a source of contention and fantasy within the Trump movement.
